about_the_game:
Build, Design, and Renovate
Start with the basics: repair broken furniture, patch up faulty wiring, and give the rooms a complete makeover. With endless customization options, you can craft spaces that meet your guests’ expectations—or go above and beyond with unique designs and upgrades to boost your motel’s reputation.

Meet Your Guests—From Travelers to Troublemakers
From weary travelers to suspicious characters, your guests come with all kinds of needs. Some require special room features, while others might "accidentally" leave valuables behind. Help them find what they’ve lost—or take advantage of the opportunity to make extra cash.

Choose Between Justice and Profit
Police reports warn you of potential criminals checking in, from thieves to gangsters. Will you tip off the authorities, or look the other way? And when a mysterious client offers you a shadowy deal to “handle” unwanted guests, will you accept the risks for a big reward?

Expand and Innovate
Grow your business by unlocking new rooms, upgrading your parking lot, and adding amenities like vending machines for extra profits. The better your service, the higher your online ratings—and the more guests you’ll attract.

Keep Everything Running
Stay on top of day-to-day operations by cleaning rooms, fixing utilities, and restocking supplies. Don’t forget about inspections from the governor—keeping your motel spotless and functional is crucial to avoid fines or penalties.

Choose Your Path
Whether you build a family-friendly getaway or a haven for the morally ambiguous, the choice is yours. Host legal events, rent rooms for underground gatherings, or juggle both while keeping your secrets hidden. Your actions shape the future of your motel.

Can you turn this rundown motel into a thriving business—or will its dark secrets consume you?

name: Roadside Motel Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon R7 260X series
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Transform a rundown highway motel into a thriving business—or a place of chaos. Renovate, design, and manage every aspect while handling unique and demanding guests, spotting criminals, and avoiding danger. Will your motel rise to fame or infamy?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish
